titleStmt.title: On the lamentable death of Lady Lee, younger: who departed this life, February 28. 1686. A funeral elegie. / N. Paterson.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Title vignette: skull & crossbones with text "memento mori."
